trussoptimizater.Elements
Class Joint

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      trussoptimizater.Elements.Element
          trussoptimizater.Elements.Joint
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Joint
extends Element

This class is really a test class and has many flaws for example

  • Assumes chords are beams which are fixed-fixed restraints
  • Assumes braces are beams which are pinned-pinned restraint

    • See Also:

      getChordCount

      public int getChordCount()
      Returns:
      the number of chords in the joint. Chords are assumed to be bars that have Fixed-Fixed restraint

      getBraceCount

      public int getBraceCount()
      Returns:
      the number of braces in the joint. Braces are assumed to be bars that have Pinned-Pinned restraint

      setGeomtery

      public void setGeomtery(double geometry)
      Parameters:
      geometry - The distance between two braces along the surface of the chord assuming that braces centerline and chord centerline meet at a sing point.

      setType

      public void setType(char type)
      Set the joint type

      Parameters:
      type - should be set to one of the following

      • Joint.X_JOINT
      • Joint.Y_JOINT
      • Joint.K_JOINT
      • Joint.UNREGONIZED
